main.name: Amogh Wagh
main.description: I enjoy creating things that live on the Internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between
main.bio: I am a technology enthusiast with good knowledge in full stack web and cross-platform development. I have also worked on the cloud front for a brief tenure of my career as well. I am passionate about building quality focused products that improves the lives of those around me. I love spending the rest of my time on fixing little details and optimizing web apps. If you do not find me doing any of these, then, you can find me gaming, listening to music, swimming, volunteering or lifting heavy things.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Information Science
education.description: The education was mainly to learn core computer science concepts, but I also learned about Java, Python, SQL, PHP, MVC, HTML, CSS and more. During my time in college, I specialized in Web Development and Deep Learning. I also learnt about the importance of building applications using computer science concepts and on how it makes a difference in the real world.

The education was mainly to learn the basics of Computer Science. This is where my inclination and love towards computer science developed. Concepts like Computational Thinking, Computer Networks, DBMS were taught to us here.

work.title: Software Development Engineer
work.description: Describe work, special projects, notable achievements, what technologies you have been working with, and anything else that would be useful for an employer to know.

work.title: Research Intern
work.description: I worked on Image Recognition in Deep Learning using Convolutional Neural Networks and Capsule Networks.

projects.title: Github Desktop Client
projects.category: Used Electron and React to create a github desktop client. Various git functionalities were added along with showing up merge conflicts and not allowing it to stage the files if there is a conflict.

projects.title: Trello React Clone
projects.category: Created a Mini Trello Clone using React and Trello API.

projects.title: Rapido Api Express
projects.category: Created a Rapido API Mockup using Express and MySQL for the back-end and HTML and MaterializeCss for the front-end.

projects.title: Olympics Dataset
projects.category: Used the Olympics dataset from Kaggle to solve a few questions using JS and visualized it using HighCharts.

projects.title: Human Activity Recognition
projects.category: Created a Human Activity Recognition System for smartphones using RNN , LSTM and WISDM accelerometer data.

projects.title: Green Tree Initiative
projects.category: Created a Human Activity Recognition System for smartphones using RNN , LSTM and WISDM accelerometer data.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
